screen_desc: The screenshot shows a Google search history page with recent search queries. The user has searched for terms like "new mascara," "2 bedroom apartment," and "capital of Brazil." Each search item is followed by an arrow icon, possibly for quick access or further actions. At the bottom, there's an option to "Manage history" to modify or clear search history.
history_actions: click on the Google app icon located at the left and lower part of the screen.
